articles.title: Valve Announces Steam Deck OLED, Says Switch OLED Paved The Way - Nintendo Life
articles.description: "It's just a great product from Nintendo"
articles.content:
Subscribe to Nintendo Life on YouTube
Game company Valve, responsible for series like Half-Life and Portal, has today announced the Steam Deck OLED, a follow-up to its original portable device with … [+1939 chars]
